title: ðŸš¨Drew Brees retires from NFL after 20 seasons - Emergency Podcast (Football 3/14)
description:
We had an inkling this decision was coming and now it's official (courtesy an Instagram post). Drew Brees has retired after 20 NFL seasons and 15 years with the New Orleans Saints. On this emergency podcast, Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson reflect on Brees' legendary career. Does he belong near the Brady/Manning discussion? Should he have won more than 1 Super Bowl? The Hall of Fame is certainly on the horizon, we know that. Brinson and Wilson also provide a lookahead for the Saints which now includes a crazy Taysom Hill deal and the possibility of a Jameis Winston return or even a trade.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

On this emergency podcast, Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson reflect on Brees' legendary career. Does he belong near the Brady/Manning discussion? Should he have won more than 1 Super Bowl? The Hall of Fame is certainly on the horizon, we know that.
